site_name: Unit 5Waldo WorksWaldo RoadLondonNW10 6AW
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Submission of details of the Ultra-Low NOx Gas fired boilers to mitigate air pollution, pursuant to Condition 3; details of an enhanced sound insulation value DnT,w and L'nT,w of at least 5dB above the Building Regulations value, for the floor structures separating different types of rooms/uses in adjoining dwellings, pursuant to Condition 4; details of the written notification of the full postal addresses of the new units at Unit 5 Waldo Works Waldo Road, pursuant to Condition 5; and detailed drawings at a scale no less than 1:20, including drawings in plan, section and elevation of the boundary treatments to the front forecourt (including railings and gates), pursuant to Condition 20 of planning permission Ref.2018/03566/FUL dated 29th June 2020.
